text: Kandi uhe inkuru nziza ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, ko bazagororerwa ubusitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru). Buri uko bazajya bafungurirwamo imbuto, bazajya bavuga bati “Izi ni zo twafungurirwaga mbere”, ndetse bazazihabwa zisa (nk’izo baryaga ku isi, ariko zitandukanye mu buryohe). Bazanagororerwamo abafasha basukuye, kandi bazanabubamo ubuziraherezo
